type AlirIndia = Array<{| Id: Number {"typeId": "int"}, airlineName: String, fCode: String, fromAirportCode: String, toAirportCode: String, departureDate: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, planeType: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"Id\\\":101,\\\"airlineName\\\":\\\"AirIndia\\\",\\\"fCode\\\":\\\"IND101\\\",\\\"fromAirportCode\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"toAirportCode\\\":\\\"BLR\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"27\\/12\\/2019\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"totalSeats\\\":200,\\\"price\\\":199,\\\"planeType\\\":\\\"airlIndia 737\\\"},{\\\"Id\\\":102,\\\"airlineName\\\":\\\"airlIndia\\\",\\\"fCode\\\":\\\"IND102\\\",\\\"fromAirportCode\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"toAirportCode\\\":\\\"BLR\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"27\\/12\\/2019\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":24,\\\"totalSeats\\\":350,\\\"price\\\":450,\\\"planeType\\\":\\\"airlIndia 747\\\"},{\\\"Id\\\":103,\\\"airlineName\\\":\\\"airlIndia\\\",\\\"fCode\\\":\\\"IND103\\\",\\\"fromAirportCode\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"toAirportCode\\\":\\\"BLR\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"27\\/12\\/2019\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":33,\\\"totalSeats\\\":400,\\\"price\\\":450,\\\"planeType\\\":\\\"airlIndia 757\\\"}]"}
